field.name: $differentLanguageMessage
field.viewer: The partner's language is different from the current language. Description and product name are in : {{record.$partnerLanguage}}

field.name: $viewerTag
field.viewer: Unrenewed Prototype

field.name: $invoicingState
field.viewer: Invoiced Partially invoiced Not invoiced

field.name: deliveryState
field.viewer: Not delivered Partially delivered Delivered

attribute.name: value
attribute.expr: eval: id && __repo__(StockMoveLine).all().filter('self.declarationLine.id = ? AND self.stockMove.availabilityRequest = TRUE AND self.stockMove.statusSelect = 2', __self__?.id).count() > 0

field.name: $isReadOnly
field.expr: eval: declaration?.statusSelect == 2 || declaration?.statusSelect == 3 && (!declaration?.orderBeingEdited || (exTaxTotal && exTaxTotal != 0 && amountInvoiced == exTaxTotal) || availabiltyRequest) || declaration?.statusSelect == 4

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: "(self.product.id = ${product?.parentProduct?.id} OR self.product.id = ${product?.id}) AND self.defineSubBillOfMaterial = true AND self.personalized = false "
